posts.post_content: For Sale Red Hindu Card of Russ Ford. Good news no creases but it is laminated.  Email for scans. [url]RBalke2617@Aol.com[/url]
another comical attempt at a sale! no price, no scan...no dice!
the beat goes on and on....laminated??
Ok guys why must you two always show your stupidity? You guys really need to mind your own business. Worry about your own stuff.
It's really not that hard to post images Robert you see how easy it was for me to post the threat you just emailed me?
Its on EBay, love that glossy finish from the laminate

[quote name="CMIZ5290" post=1643116]the beat goes on and on....laminated??[/QUOTE]

So if it is advertised as laminated what is the issue selling it that way? You guys should only be interfering, imo, if there is something being done fraudulently, or unethically or with a total lack of transparency. I am not seeing it?

and yes the OP should have at least put the Ebay price of 750 OBO......but that isn't a rule.
Just do me a favor Leon just delete me and all my threads from this site. Sorry to many nasty people here it's not for me.

[quote name="ullmandds" post=1643130]It's really not that hard to post images Robert you see how easy it was for me to post the threat you just emailed me?[/QUOTE]


Must be pretty hard. The image is so small you can not see it. LOL.

I am sure he is pretty mad. I wouldn't say the price is terrible. A laminated one just sold for 575 and it is OBO.

Good luck with the sale.
